original_text: I am sure that you do not want to wait until they are old enough for you to marry them! Would you wait all that time and not marry anyone else? So, my daughters, you must not return to Judah with me. You should not have to share my pain. The Lord has turned against me.’
korean_text: 너희가 어찌 그들이 자라기를 기다리겠으며 어찌 남편 없이 지내겠다고 결심하겠느냐 내 딸들아 그렇지 아니하니라 여호와의 손이 나를 치셨으므로 나는 너희로 말미암아 더욱 마음이 아프도다 하매

sentences.original_text: I am sure that you do not want to wait
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희가 기다리고 싶지 않다는 것을 확신한다

sentences.original_text: Would you wait all that time
you must not return to Judah with me.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 나와 유다로 돌아가지 말아야 한다

sentences.original_text: You should not have to share my pain.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 나의 고통을 나누어 가질 필요가 없다

sentences.original_text: The Lord has turned against me.'
